attributes.description:
Please visit www.cbkmotors.co.za for a virtual tour of this car as well as our online showroom. You can also click the Finance Option to do a remote finance application and get pre-approved on the vehicle of your choice. ONE COMPANY OWNED IT SINCE NEW! It was owned by one company until it liquidated, come and see! Very well maintained! Fantastic value for money! Motor runs like smoothly! It is a Toyota, what more do we have to say? This is a great car for business, great on fuel and she is clean and mechanically sound. If you want something that has space, good for business and will last you a lifetime then she is the one for you. Great Value for money. We take things a little more seriously at CBK Motors we do a full ABC Assessment on all vehicles. A: Body for dents, scratches, and scuff marks. B: Overall Mechanical check over and C: Cosmetic and interior assessment for your buying pleasure! E&O
COME AND VIEW!
Finance Can be Arranged!
Please contact our friendly and professional sales team for assistance!
Office: 010 449 3410 
David : 067 131 6474
